Text: Thanks uploader. Good quality. Switch to track 2 for English.
Good quality but how do you switch to track 2????
Good quality s=8 v=7 but I am also unsure how to switch to track 2 for English? The Russian voice over makes watching impossible. Would I need to download again??

@james

Just download VLC media player and switch to track 2 under the Audio menu.

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6730575/BBC__Wonders_Of_The_Universe_%282011%29_-_BDRip_%28Eng%29

Same videos but English only (Russian audio tracks removed).
Thanks man! V9 a10 Russian switches off in VLC. No watermarks.

Great collection  , great quality !!!
With Vlc player go to Sound->Audio Track->Select Track 2 and Russian is gone , just like that ;)

For non-VLC user who stream video, this is how you get rid of the track (better disable it).
http://forum.videohelp.com/threads/293652-AVI-with-two-audio-channels-How-do-I-remove-one-of-them
